pr_title: [ML] remove thread sleep from results persister

timeline.message:
[ML] remove thread sleep from results persister
Having a thread sleep in a recurring action may cause issues on node shutdown.
What if the thread is sleeping while a nice shutdown is occurring? Since these retry timeouts
can extend to a larger period of time, we should instead use scheduled tasks + the threadpool.
This allows the retries to be effectively canceled instead of waiting for a thread to wake back up.

closes https://github.com/elastic/elasticsearch/issues/65890
clearing up retry logging and fixing delay

replies.bodyText:
could be a field in BulkRetryableAction and buildNewRequestFromFailures could be called directly.

No, it cannot. Because the action is passed via super the super is ctor'd before the child class is. So, references DIRECTLY to the child class methods is not possible.
This class guaruntees things are constructed and mutable inside the lambda passed to super.
